definition: to press charges/to file a complaint
to say/to tell/to announce/to report/to denounce/to file a lawsuit/to sue

sentences.english: He told me that I should have sold tickets.
sentences.chinese: 他告诉我，我必须卖票啊。

sentences.english: A truck rear-end our van on the freeway.
sentences.chinese: 在告诉公路上一辆卡车从后面撞上我们的休旅车。

sentences.english: LJ says his parents aren’t home, but they will be soon.
sentences.chinese: LJ告诉他父母并不在家，但很快会回来的。

sentences.english: The guy in blue told me they were teasing the silk.
sentences.chinese: 穿蓝衣的这位老哥告诉我他们正梳理的是Silk。

sentences.english: I told you that in the dedication of my last work.
sentences.chinese: 在我上一部作品的献辞中，我就这样告诉过你。

sentences.english: The lacquered screen that tells the history of a clan of scholars?
sentences.chinese: 能告诉人们一派雅士传奇的漆质屏风？

sentences.english: The Bible tells us to forgive our enemies; not our friends. – Margot Asquith.
sentences.chinese: 圣经告诉我原谅我们的敌人，但没说要原谅朋友。

sentences.english: But she did not tell her husband Nabal.
sentences.chinese: 这事她却没有告诉丈夫拿八。

sentences.english: When Natalie finds out he is a detective she tells him to stay away from her family.
sentences.chinese: 当纳塔莉发现他是一名侦探，她告诉他远离她的家庭。

sentences.english: No one wanted detainees ” the special-operations officer told me.
sentences.chinese: 没有人想要的是囚犯，”这个特战官员告诉我。

sentences.english: We went to see Coach, and she showed us how to collect sap too.
sentences.chinese: 我们去看教练，然后她也告诉了我们怎样采集糖树汁。

sentences.english: I have been told my car is a complete write-off , impossible to repair.
sentences.chinese: 我已经告诉你我的汽车已经报废了，根本不可能修好。

sentences.english: Polina also didn’t share the information with her sister.
sentences.chinese: 波琳娜也没有把这件事告诉她的妹妹。

sentences.english: If love told me walked to down I'll spell to love go end.
sentences.chinese: 如果爱告诉我走下去我会拼到爱尽头。

sentences.english: "We were discussing the history of Volantis, " Haldon said to him.
sentences.chinese: “我们正在讨论瓦兰提斯的历史，”哈尔顿告诉他。

sentences.english: If you’re a burglar, tell me how to keep bad guys out of my house.
sentences.chinese: 如果你是一个盗贼，告诉我怎样让坏蛋远离我的家。

definition: to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)
to know/to become aware of/also pr. [zhi1 dao5]
to find out/to know/to learn about
to introduce (sb to sb)/to give a presentation/to present (sb for a job etc)/introduction
to/for/for the benefit of/to give/to allow/to do sth (for sb)/(grammatical equivalent of 被)/(grammatical equivalent of 把)/(sentence intensifier)
to hear (sth said)/one hears (that)/hearsay/listening and speaking
variant of 聯繫|联系[lian2 xi4]
connection/contact/relation/to get in touch with/to integrate/to link/to touch
towards/to face/to turn towards/direction/to support/to side with/shortly before/formerly/always/all along/(suffix) suitable for .../oriented to ...
to tend toward/to guide/variant of 向[xiang4]
variant of 向[xiang4]/direction/orientation/to face/to turn toward/to/towards/shortly before/formerly
